title: Riot took my LP give it back
body: Tell me the reasoning behind me being the one getting a leaver. Fix ur fking game Riot, this is bs, I also got leaver buster for this. Ez and Talon were afk, and I get the leave? WTF. I demand my lp back.

replies.body:
Any players who were AFK at the time of the remake, regardless of reason, receive the applicable leaver penalties. The /remake system still holds players accountable for ensuring that computer issues, scheduling issues, etc are resolved ahead of time to reduce the number of matches that become lopsided, with a player or players AFK. 

You can read more about Remake here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686

And you can read more about LeaverBuster here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714

How was I afk??

I bought items, went to lane and was csing.

If you weren’t AFK at the time of the Remake vote, then this is likely either a visual or gameplay glitch. I’d recommend posting a thread in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) sub-board!
